title: Identify FBD for block on rough ramp

content.question: A box is given a sudden push up a ramp. Friction between the box and the ramp is not negligible. Which of the following diagrams best represents the directions of the actual forces acting on the box as it moves upward after the push?

choices.label: Choice A has one arrow pointing up and to the left perpendicular to the plane, one arrow pointing straight down, and one arrow pointing down and to the left parallel to the plane.

Choice B has one arrow pointing up and to the left perpendicular to the plane, one arrow pointing straight down, one arrow pointing down and to the left parallel to the plane, and one arrow pointing up and to the right parallel to the plane.
Choice C has one arrow pointing up and to the left perpendicular to the plane, one arrow pointing straight down, and one arrow pointing up and to the right parallel to the plane.

Choice D has one arrow pointing up and to the left perpendicular to the plane, one arrow pointing down and to the right perpendicular to the plane, one arrow pointing down and to the left parallelto the plane, and one arrow pointing up and to the right parallel to the plane.

Choice E has one arrow pointing up and to the left perpendicular to the plane, one arrow pointing down and to the right perpendicular to the plane, and one arrow pointing up and to the right parallel to the plane.

content.answer: Choice A has one arrow pointing up and to the left perpendicular to the plane, one arrow pointing straight down, and one arrow pointing down and to the left parallel to the plane.
